name: Triggers Engine
description: GDD, weather, and disease window monitoring per area to trigger application recommendations.

prd.problemStatement: Optimal application timing depends on complex environmental factors including GDD thresholds, weather windows, and disease pressure. Manual monitoring is time-consuming and error-prone.
goals: Monitor GDD accumulation per area and grass type
Track weather windows for optimal applications
userStories: As a superintendent, I want automatic GDD tracking so that I time applications optimally
As a superintendent, I want weather window alerts so that I don't miss application opportunities
